text: 4|97|Yara nijedera upara yuluma kare tadera prana grahanera samaya phirisatagana bale, ‘tomara ki abasthaya chile?’ Tara bale, ‘duniyaya amara asahaya chilama;’ tara bale, ‘allahara yamina ki emana prasasta chila na yekhane tomara hijarata karate [1]?’ Edera'i abasasthala jahannama, ara ta kata manda abasa [2]
